overview:
Erin thrives in conceptualizing, creating and cultivating brands. Driven by a passion for all things creative, she’s led the marketing efforts for 3 Chicago start-ups. Helping grow a Chicago based Real Estate Company- Homescout Realty; launching the brand and marketing of a web based hiring technology-Hireology, and now taking on the most recent venture of Marketing Manager for UrbanBound. Erin is thrilled to be part of the launch team, taking part in building a product and a brand that miraculously makes moving exciting and easy.

As the leader of the Chicago HubSpot User Group and recurring guest speaker at Loyola University Chicago, she finds joy in helping others pursue their goals through effective marketing.

Erin graduated from Loyola University Chicago with honors, obtaining her degree in Public Relations/Advertising, Visual Communications and French. When she’s not thinking of hashtags, blogging and SEO, you can find her: rocking out at concerts, relaxing on a camping trip, tomahawk chopping during Florida State football games or cheering on the (ahem..World Champion) St. Louis Cardinals.
